content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 0, Barcelona 3.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 0, Barcelona 3.
Foul by Michael Pereira (Mallorca).
Martín Montoya (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Akihiro Ienaga (Mallorca) left footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left.
Substitution, Barcelona. Martín Montoya replaces Adriano.
